ygData.subject: RE: Value of lambent stones (was AC Dilemma)
ygData.msgSnippet: I tried to Chain/Fear Choon the other night at level 31.  My Fear just didn t seem to be taking hold on this guy.  It was like he was out of range (no resist
ygData.messageBody:
I tried to Chain/Fear Choon the other night at level 31. My Fear just
didn't seem to be taking hold on this guy. It was like he was out of range
(no resist message), but he was hitting me for 60s and 70s. I dutifully
stood at his feet Screeching while he pummeled me trying to get it to take
hold. Screech *finally* worked and he turned and fled. I had exactly 12
HPs left at that point, so I decided chasing after him was probably a bad
idea.

If you try this at 27th, be careful!

Crier

>
> I also meant to ask this in my last email.........
>
> Can someone give me a good tactic on how I can take Choon/Froon, I hear
> stuff about Fear/Chains etc but Fear has a really poor range and you have
> to be within hitting range for it to work, if I get too close to Choon he
> hits me and interupts my song, am I doing something wrong or is it just a
> hard trick to pull off?
>
> I tried to melee Choon but I barely hit him, maybe I should wait
> till level
> 28 so that I may have a chance with my Staff Proc (Chaotic Feedback).
>
> Any help/info would be greatly appreciated, and if anyone on Veeshan
> fancies helping a fellow bard then that would also be appreciated too.
>
> Madagan, bard of 27 songs - Veeshan
>
